posts.post_content:
Raw or graded, eye appeal is more important to me than the technical grade.  Looking for the following:  Bresnahan, Devlin, Doyle, Krause, Mitchell, McConnell, Mullin, Magee, Rucker, Willis, Wiltse, Napping, Jordan & Herzog, Myers, Ames, Bell, Gibson, Konetchy, Lord, Niles, Smith, Sullivan, Wallace.

Mark
